traits.Keen Smell: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
traits.Pack Tactics: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
traits.Tunneler: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.Multiattack: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.
actions.Stab: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Spike: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
